mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.edid AS "pwEnterDetail.id", a.apply_id AS "actYwApply.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
ay.rel_id AS "actYwApply.relId", ay.yw_id AS "actYwApply.actYw.id", ay.proc_ins_id AS "actYwApply.procInsId", ay.no AS "actYwApply.no", ay.type AS "actYwApply.type", ay.apply_user_id AS "actYwApply.applyUser.id", ay.remarks AS "actYwApply.remarks", ay.create_date AS "actYwApply.createDate", ay.create_by AS "actYwApply.createBy.id",
b.id AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.id", b.no AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.no", b.applicant AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.id", b.status AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.status", b.term AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.term", b.cursel AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.cursel", b.term_num AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.termNum", b.exit_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.exitDate", b.re_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.reDate", b.start_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.startDate", b.end_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.endDate", b.update_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.updateDate", b.update_by AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.updateBy.id", b.create_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.createDate", b.create_by AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.createBy.id", b.remarks AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.remarks", b.del_flag AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.delFlag",
er.id AS "erooms.id", er.num AS "erooms.num", er.eid AS "erooms.pwEnter.id", er.rid AS "erooms.pwRoom.id", er.update_date AS "erooms.updateDate", er.update_by AS "erooms.updateBy.id", er.create_date AS "erooms.createDate", er.create_by AS "erooms.createBy.id", er.remarks AS "erooms.remarks", er.del_flag AS "erooms.delFlag",
er.rname AS "erooms.pwRoom.name", er.ralias AS "erooms.pwRoom.alias", er.rperson AS "erooms.pwRoom.person", er.rphone AS "erooms.pwRoom.phone", er.rmobile AS "erooms.pwRoom.mobile", er.rtype AS "erooms.pwRoom.type", er.rcolor AS "erooms.pwRoom.color", er.rnum AS "erooms.pwRoom.num", er.ris_allowm AS "erooms.pwRoom.isAllowm", er.ris_usable AS "erooms.pwRoom.isUsable", er.rsid AS "erooms.pwRoom.sid",
er.psparent_id AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.id", er.psparent_ids AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parentIds", er.psname AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.name", er.psperson AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.person", er.pstype AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.type", er.psphone AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.phone", er.psmobile AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.mobile", er.psopen_week AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.openWeek", er.psam_open_start_time AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.amOpenStartTime", er.psam_open_end_time AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.amOpenEndTime", er.pspm_open_start_time AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.pmOpenStartTime", er.pspm_open_end_time AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.pmOpenEndTime", er.psfloor_num AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.floorNum", er.psarea AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.area", er.psupdate_date AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.updateDate", er.psupdate_by AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.updateBy.id", er.pscreate_date AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.createDate", er.pscreate_by AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.createBy.id", er.psremarks AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.remarks", er.psdel_flag AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.delFlag",
er.pspparent_id AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parent.id", er.pspparent_ids AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parentIds", er.pspname AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.name",
er.psppparent_id AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parent.parent.id", er.psppparent_ids AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parent.parentIds", er.psppname AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parent.name",
er.pspppparent_id AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parent.parent.parent.id", er.pspppparent_ids AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parent.parent.parentIds", er.pspppname AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parent.parent.name",
er.psppppparent_id AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parent.parent.parent.parent.id", er.psppppparent_ids AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parent.parent.parent.parentIds", er.psppppname AS "erooms.pwRoom.pwSpace.parent.parent.parent.parent.name",
u3.name AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.name", u3.no AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.no", u3.sex AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.sex", u3.email AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.email", u3.phone AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.phone", u3.mobile AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.mobile", u3.id_type AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.idType", u3.id_no AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.idNumber", u3.professional AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.professional", o.name AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.office.name"

a.id AS "id", a.edid AS "pwEnterDetail.id", a.apply_id AS "actYwApply.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag",
ay.rel_id AS "actYwApply.relId", ay.yw_id AS "actYwApply.actYw.id", ay.proc_ins_id AS "actYwApply.procInsId", ay.no AS "actYwApply.no", ay.type AS "actYwApply.type", ay.apply_user_id AS "actYwApply.applyUser.id", ay.remarks AS "actYwApply.remarks", ay.create_date AS "actYwApply.createDate", ay.create_by AS "actYwApply.createBy.id",
bd.eid AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.id", bd.rid AS "pwEnterDetail.rid", bd.type AS "pwEnterDetail.type", bd.update_date AS "pwEnterDetail.updateDate", bd.update_by AS "pwEnterDetail.updateBy.id", bd.create_date AS "pwEnterDetail.createDate", bd.create_by AS "pwEnterDetail.createBy.id", bd.remarks AS "pwEnterDetail.remarks", bd.del_flag AS "pwEnterDetail.delFlag",
b.no AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.no", b.applicant AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.id", b.status AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.status", b.term AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.term", b.cursel AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.cursel", b.term_num AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.termNum", b.exit_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.exitDate", b.re_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.reDate", b.start_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.startDate", b.end_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.endDate", b.update_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.updateDate", b.update_by AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.updateBy.id", b.create_date AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.createDate", b.create_by AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.createBy.id", b.remarks AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.remarks", b.del_flag AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.delFlag",
u3.name AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.name", u3.no AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.no", u3.sex AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.sex", u3.email AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.email", u3.phone AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.phone", u3.mobile AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.mobile", u3.id_type AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.idType", u3.id_no AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.idNumber", u3.professional AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.professional", o.name AS "pwEnterDetail.pwEnter.applicant.office.name"

er.id AS "id", er.eid AS "eid", er.rid AS "rid", er.update_date AS "update_date", er.update_by AS "update_by", er.create_date AS "create_date", er.create_by AS "create_by", er.remarks AS "remarks", er.del_flag AS "del_flag",
pr.name AS "rname", pr.alias AS "ralias", pr.person AS "rperson", pr.phone AS "rphone", pr.mobile AS "rmobile", pr.type AS "rtype", pr.color AS "rcolor", pr.num AS "rnum", pr.is_allowm AS "ris_allowm", pr.is_usable AS "ris_usable", pr.sid AS "rsid",
ps.parent_id AS "psparent_id", ps.parent_ids AS "psparent_ids", ps.name AS "psname", ps.person AS "psperson", ps.type AS "pstype", ps.phone AS "psphone", ps.mobile AS "psmobile", ps.open_week AS "psopen_week", ps.am_open_start_time AS "psam_open_start_time", ps.am_open_end_time AS "psam_open_end_time", ps.pm_open_start_time AS "pspm_open_start_time", ps.pm_open_end_time AS "pspm_open_end_time", ps.floor_num AS "psfloor_num", ps.area AS "psarea", ps.update_date AS "psupdate_date", ps.update_by AS "psupdate_by", ps.create_date AS "pscreate_date", ps.create_by AS "pscreate_by", ps.del_flag AS "psdel_flag", ps.remarks AS "psremarks",
psp.parent_id AS "pspparent_id", psp.parent_ids AS "pspparent_ids", psp.name AS "pspname",
pspp.parent_id AS "psppparent_id", pspp.parent_ids AS "psppparent_ids", pspp.name AS "psppname",
psppp.parent_id AS "pspppparent_id", psppp.parent_ids AS "pspppparent_ids", psppp.name AS "pspppname",
pspppp.parent_id AS "psppppparent_id", pspppp.parent_ids AS "psppppparent_ids", pspppp.name AS "psppppname"

LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
FROM pw_enter_room er LEFT JOIN pw_room pr ON pr.id = er.rid LEFT JOIN pw_space ps ON ps.id = pr.sid LEFT JOIN pw_space psp ON psp.id = ps.parent_id LEFT JOIN pw_space pspp ON pspp.id = psp.parent_id LEFT JOIN pw_space psppp ON psppp.id = pspp.parent_id LEFT JOIN pw_space pspppp ON pspppp.id = psppp.parent_id ) er ON er.eid = b.id
LEFT JOIN act_yw_apply ay ON ay.id = a.apply_id LEFT JOIN pw_enter b ON b.id = ay.rel_id LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = b.applicant LEFT JOIN sys_office o ON o.id = u3.office_id
LEFT JOIN act_yw_apply ay ON ay.id = a.apply_id LEFT JOIN pw_enter_detail bd ON bd.id = a.edid LEFT JOIN pw_enter b ON b.id = bd.eid LEFT JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.id = b.applicant
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pw_enter_rel( id, edid, apply_id, update_date, update_by, create_date, create_by, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{pwEnterDetail.id}, #{actYwApply.id}, #{updateDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pw_enter_rel SET edid = #{pwEnterDetail.id}, apply_id = #{actYwApply.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
